title: Manage a Trailer Pool at a Customer
description: A high-volume customer has a 'trailer pool' where empty trailers are dropped for them to load at their convenience. A dispatcher must manage the pool's inventory.

tasks.description: Check the current number of empty trailers at the customer's location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows there are 2 empty trailers in the pool.

tasks.description: The customer notifies that they have just finished loading one of the trailers.
The dispatcher creates a new load in the system for the loaded trailer and dispatches a driver to pick it up.
tasks.expected_outcome: A driver is sent to retrieve the loaded trailer.

tasks.description: Seeing the pool of empties is now low, the dispatcher also dispatches a driver to drop off a new empty trailer to replenish the pool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The trailer pool is managed to ensure the customer always has empties available.
